abstract: The oil company BP agreed to freeze millions of dollars in payments to its former chief executive, John Browne, and its departing global refining chief, John Manzoni.
snippet: The oil company BP agreed to freeze millions of dollars in payments to its former chief executive, John Browne, and its departing global refining chief, John Manzoni.
lead_paragraph: The oil company BP agreed yesterday to freeze millions of dollars in payments to its former chief executive, John Browne, and its departing global refining chief, John Manzoni, while it defends itself against shareholder accusations of mismanagement.

headline.main: BP Freezes Payout to Two Ex-Executives Till Suit Ends
headline.print_headline: BP Freezes Payout to Two Ex-Executives Till Suit Ends
